info.description:
This API will return a collection of Service Data.

The base endpoint URL for this API in production is: `https://marko.aramark.net/v1/service`.

For testing the API with the "Try" tool on this page or in your app, use either our testing server "qa-marko" or our development server "dev-marko".
info.title: Service

tags.description: A collection of Menu Item data

get.summary: Get Customer Count for a Service Area
get.description: Returns a collection of Customer Counts for a Service Area

put.summary: Update Customer Count for a Service Area
put.description: Allows updates to Customer Count for a Service Area

requestBody.description: Details for the Customer Count that is being updated

message.description: Status Message for the Update Request

get.description: Returns a collection of Sites for a Device

get.summary: Get Equipment for a Location or Service Area
get.description: Returns a collection of Features for a Location or Service Area. service_area_id or location_id is required

requestBody.description: Details for the Equipment Temperature that is being updated

message.description: Status Message for the Update Request

get.summary: Get Features for a Site or Location
get.description: Returns a collection of Features for a Site or Location. site_id or location_id is required

get.summary: Get Menu Items for a Service Area, Location or Sub Location
get.description: Returns a collection of Menu Items for a Service Area, Location or Sub Location. At least one of service_area_id, location_id or sub_location_id is required

count.description: Number of records returned in request

requestBody.description: Details for the Menu Item that is being updated

message.description: Status Message for the Update Request

get.summary: Get Menu Items for a Service Area, Location or Sub Location
get.description: Returns a flattened collection of Menu Items for a Service Area, Location or Sub Location. At least one of service_area_id, location_id or sub_location_id is required

count.description: Number of records returned in request

get.summary: Get Pricing for Manufacturer Items for a Location
get.description: Returns a collection of Manufacturer Item Pricing for a Location.

count.description: Number of records returned in request

get.description: Returns a collection of Temperatures for a Service Area or Location. Must include location_id or service_area_id

200.description: Lists Temperatures data for a Service Area or Location

get.description: Returns a collection of Details for a Site.

get.summary: Get Recipe Swap Recommendations for a Recipe
get.description: Returns a collection of Recipe Swap Recommendations

mfgItemSequenceParam.name: mfg_item_seqs
mfgItemSequenceParam.description: Comma seperated list of Manufacture Item Sequence values

dateParam.name: date
dateParam.description: Date of the requested data. YYYY-MM-DD foramt.

logDateParam.name: log_date
logDateParam.description: Log Date of the requested data. YYYY-MM-DD foramt. log_date or service_date is required

logDateReqParam.name: log_date
logDateReqParam.description: Log Date of the requested data. YYYY-MM-DD foramt.

endLogDateParam.name: end_log_date
endLogDateParam.description: End Log Date of the requested data. YYYY-MM-DD foramt.

equipmentTypeParam.name: equipment_type
equipmentTypeParam.description: Equipemnt type of the requested data

serviceDateParam.name: service_date
serviceDateParam.description: Service Date of the requested data. YYYY-MM-DD foramt. log_date or service_date is required

serviceDateReqParam.name: service_date
serviceDateReqParam.description: Service Date of the requested data. YYYY-MM-DD foramt.

subLocationIdParam.name: sub_location_id
subLocationIdParam.description: Unique ID of Sub Location aka Station for a Service Date.

mealPeriodIdParam.name: meal_period_id
mealPeriodIdParam.description: Unique ID of Meal Period for a Location and Service Date

isMTOParam.name: is_mto
isMTOParam.description: Filter for Made to Order Menu Items

isResultRequiredParam.name: is_result_required
isResultRequiredParam.description: Filter for menu results required for Menu Items

isTempRequiredParam.name: is_temp_required
isTempRequiredParam.description: Filter for Menu Items which require temperature readings

fieldsParam.name: fields
fieldsParam.description: Comma delimited list to reduce the fields of response object.  When used the property "location_id" will always be appended to the list for a consistent field for response testing.

lineOfBusinessParam.name: line_of_business
lineOfBusinessParam.description: Line of Business of the Recipe

rankHighParam.name: rank_high
rankHighParam.description: Highest ranked swap match to return

rankLowParam.name: rank_low
rankLowParam.description: Lowest ranked swap match to return

bypassCacheParam.name: bypass-cache
bypassCacheParam.description: This HTTP Header variable will bypass cache

smokeParam.name: smoke
smokeParam.description: When set to 'true' this HTTP Header variable will route to the Integration environment.  Only applicable in QA Server.

apikey.name: apikey
apikey.description: This HTTP Header variable will verify security

requestor_sp_guid.description: sp GUID of the requestor for the Site. Either requestor_sp_guid or device_serial_number MUST be included

is_mto.description: Enumerator of 'Y' or 'N' to indicate that the Item is a 'Made to   Order" recipe

is_result_required.description: Enumerator of 'Y' or 'N' to determine if the menu item should   require a service result.

is_closed.description: Closed Flag for the Menu Items
